episode_event_bunches_beauty/4001_1001_0: I can’t wait to be a grown-up...

I want to become a cool grown-up, just
like Diantha...
I want to be independent, too...

You are independent! You’re a Gym
Leader, Flannery!

But I’m just not as put together and mature as all
those grown-ups seem to be...
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4001_1001_1:
Let’s study together and learn how to become
cool grown-ups!
So that’s how we ended up here!

I was surprised when you asked us whether we
knew any cool grown-ups.
Hmm... I do have some people in mind...
But you’ll need a lot of courage...
It’s OK! I’ll do my best!
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4001_1001_2: Perfect! Let me take you to them!
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4002_1001_0: Ahaha! Is that why you came to us?
I don’t mind the reason, but we’re pretty strict.
We hope your souls don’t turn ice-cold!
My heart feels like it’s freezing!
Do you have the courage to learn from us?

Of course! I wanna be a cool grown-up as soon
as I can!

I won’t run away, no matter how harsh your
training is!
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4002_1001_1:
Please teach us! I still have a lot to learn, but
I’ll do my best!

That’s an answer I like to hear! OK then, let’s
do this!
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4003_1001_0: Wow, you both actually meant it.
Ahaha, both of you did very well.

I’m looking forward to seeing how cool and
grown-up you’ll be.
OK then, let’s head to the next place!
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4004_1001_0:
If you’re trying to be a grown-up, you gotta go
for dark and edgy!

You’re studying how to become grown-ups?
I like that.

Dark clothes look really good when cool
grown-ups wear them!

I see... So I can be more mature by being
less noisy.
Get stronger so you don’t lose to anyone.
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4005_1001_0:
Grown-ups with a calm and soft demeanor
are also quite lovely.

Let’s learn from Cheryl about slow living in
the forest.

OK then. Let’s look for the medicinal plants I taught
you about earlier.
I found one! Is this it?
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4006_1001_0: You two aren’t spending your time very wisely.

Live your life to the fullest, and your spirit will
mature on its own.

Give it time to accumulate, and that will help you
discover your unique charm.
episode_event_bunches_beauty/4006_1001_1: Actually, no—Master! Please teach us about life!

Both of you didn’t understand the meaning of what
I just said, did you...
